detail_desc: Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Shorts in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Regular elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs in a double layer with slits in the sides and scalloped hems.
Straight-cut dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
Short dress in a fine knit with ribbing at the front, a decorative hole pattern at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with hole-patterned ends, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, print motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Belt in regenerated leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.
Short jersey top with a V-neck, short sleeves, decorative buttons and a tie detail at the front and an elasticated hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer and rounded at the back.

Short dress in jersey with a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with concealed press-studs. Seam at the waist, a flared skirt and scalloped trims around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Lightweight, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that tie at the base of the back.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and a single button fastening at the front. Jetted front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Blouse in airy chiffon with pin-tucks and concealed buttons down the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves with sewn-in pleats at the shoulders. Lined front and back.
Jumper in a jacquard knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Shortie briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a butterfly appliqué on the front and an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and a placket with press-studs.

Trousers in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist and a small fabric appliqué on the front. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains. Adjustable length 46-53 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft wool jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric containing Tencel™ lyocell with an opening and button at the back of the neck and wide sleeves with a drawstring.
Stretch treggings with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit cotton top and patterned mesh skirt. Motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined skirt.

Wide, V-neck shirt jacket in cotton twill with a concealed zip down the front, yoke at the back and concealed elasticated drawstring at the waist. Flap chest and front pockets, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with a tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, loose, textured knit with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim decorated with sparkly stones at the front. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.
Fine-knit gloves in a wool blend with imitation leather trims.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and raw-edge hem.
Dress in slub-cotton jersey with a decorative frill at the top, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Deep neckline with decorative gathers at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tiered skirt for added width. Unlined.
Boots in imitation leather with pile. Lacing at the front and a zip in the side. Rubber soles. Pile lining.
A pair of earrings in metal decorated with petal-shaped plastic beads.
Slip-on trainers in fabric with a decorative bow at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, racer back, wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

V-neck playsuit in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. Opening with ties at the back of the neck, flutter sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets. Short, wide legs. Lined at the top.

Cardigan in soft pile with a small glittery embroidered detail at the top. Zip down the front with a heart-shaped tab and chin guard. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing with a glittery stripe around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in velour with a small stand-up collar and zip at the top.
Ankle-high, imitation suede sandals with cut-out sections and lacing. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8.5 cm.
Wide, straight-cut sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Loose fit with a round, slightly wider neckline, short sleeves, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit pointelle cardigan in a soft viscose blend with dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and no buttons. Ribbing at the cuffs, hem and along the side seams and front opening.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapering legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
A pair of thin metal ball chain hoop earrings decorated with rhinestone pineapples.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and a wide elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Sleeveless top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back.

Pyjamas in soft, gently draping satin with lace details. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative covered buttons at the front and a drawstring at the waist. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in seersucker made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Straight cut with a seam at the hips and a gathered, flared skirt. Cotton lining.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Spiral twist metal earrings. Length 9 cm.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed hem and an appliqué on the front.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck with ties, short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short, cable-knit jumper in a soft wool blend with long raglan sleeves and decorative pompoms at the front and down the sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, frill details at the front and long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey underdress.
Low-rise trousers in washed, superstretch twill with front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front.
Joggers in airy, lightweight jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Lightweight sports boxer shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated waist and slightly longer legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs, one with an appliqué.
Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Flap front, back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening.
Loose-fitting vest top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck.
Short skirt with a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and straight legs with quilted sections at the knees.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.
